data.meta_description: urn_isbn_978-952-61-0299-3 - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This document provides an abstract for Yanan Zhang's dissertation titled "Approaches to Resolving the International Documentary Letters of Credit Fraud Issue". The dissertation examines approaches to resolving fraud issues in international documentary letters of credit from both legal and business perspectives. The legal approach includes analyzing criminal law remedies and civil law approaches like fraud exception rules. The dissertation also compares fraud exception rules and practices in international conventions, England, and China. Additionally, it explores the possibility of using arbitration and alternative dispute resolution methods to resolve letters of credit fraud disputes. Finally, the dissertation proposes several preventative measures from a business perspective to address the issue.
